statements: DELETE FROM TicketAvailability WHERE ticket_name = 'VIP Ticket';
DELETE FROM TicketAvailability WHERE ticket_id = 101 AND total_quantity = 50;
DELETE FROM TicketAvailability WHERE ticket_name = 'VIP Ticket' AND current_quantity > 10;
DELETE FROM tickets WHERE id = 100 AND ticket_name = 'Concert Ticket'
DELETE FROM ticket_sales WHERE sale_id IN (SELECT sale_id FROM ticket_sales WHERE quantity > 5)
DELETE FROM availability WHERE ticket_id = 2002 AND remaining_quantity < 5;
